import React from "react"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { addCategory } from "~/store/category/action"; const FormCreateCategory = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const submitCategory = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(e.target.description) dispatch( addCategory({ name: e.target.name, description:e.target.description }) ); }; return (
{/*

); }; export default FormCreateCategory;
